DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the effects of combination losartan versus combination atenolol in patients with ambulatory systolic hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Losartan and HCTZ and Amlodipine vs Atenolol and Amlodipine (0954A-309)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Males or females at least 18 years of age who have ambulatory systolic hypertension.
